articles.title: Europe visit comes at a time when region faces many challenges, choices, says PM - Hindustan Times
articles.description: This would be PM Modi's first foreign visit this year.  He would be visiting Germany, Denmark and France.  | Latest News India
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday issued a departure statement before he leaves for Germany in his first visit to Europe this year. My visit to Europe comes at a time when the region faces many … [+1973 chars]

articles.title: Russian state TV simulates terrifying nuclear strike on Europe amid WW3 concerns - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Kremlin-backed TV in Russia simulated a nuclear strike on Paris, Berlin and London as presenters claimed there would be 'no survivors' and the missiles would obliterate European capitals in a number of minutes.
articles.content:
Russian State TV showed what would happen in the event of a terrifying nuclear strike on Europe, declaring that there would be 'no survivors' in a rant response to the UK's support for Ukraine.
